mapper.select: select pi.periodical_id as pId,pi.periodical_cn_name as pCnName,pi.host_organization as hOrgan,pi.cycle as cycle,pi.press as press,pi.issn_no as isNo,pi.in_fix_price as iFPrice, p.cycle_nums as cNums,p.periodical_issue_no as pIsNo,p.periodical_state as pState,p.periodical_year as pYear,p.issue_opinion as isOpinion,p.issue_time as isTime from periodical_info pi,periodical p where pi.periodical_id=p.periodical_id and (p.periodical_state='0' or p.periodical_state='PI' or p.periodical_state='ADPO')

select pi.periodical_id as pId,pi.periodical_cn_name as pCnName,pi.host_organization as hOrgan,pi.cycle as cycle,pi.press as press,pi.issn_no as isNo,pi.in_fix_price as iFPrice, p.cycle_nums as cNums,p.periodical_issue_no as pIsNo,p.periodical_state as pState,p.periodical_year as pYear,p.issue_opinion as isOpinion,p.issue_time as isTime from periodical_info pi,periodical p where pi.periodical_id=p.periodical_id and p.periodical_state='ADPO'
